indications:
Indications relief of abdominal colic and distension, particularly
in irritable bowel syndrome
name: PEPPERMINT OIL
breadcrumbs: 1.2 Antispasmodics and other drugs altering gut motility
side-effects:
Side-effects heartburn, perianal irritation; rarely, allergic
reactions (including rash, headache, bradycardia, muscle tremor, ataxia)Local irritation Capsules should not be broken
or chewed because peppermint oil may irritate mouth
or oesophagus
doses:
adult and child over 15 years, 1–2 capsules, swallowed whole
with water, 3 times daily for up to 3 months if necessary
pregnancy: Pregnancy not known to be harmful
